level.heading: Computer linkages to any emergency assistance unit and assessment center.
level.text: * ยง 21-125 Computer linkages to any emergency assistance unit and assessment center. For the purpose of facilitating the provision and coordination of benefits to homeless individuals and families, the commissioner shall provide computer linkages, and personnel where necessary to access such linkages, at any emergency assistance unit and assessment center as may be operated by, or under contract with, the department of homeless services. * NB Expired July 1, 1998
